title: Stop Caring about Kubernetes with Azure Container Apps & Dapr - Todd Whitehead - NDC Melbourne 2022

media:group.media:title: Stop Caring about Kubernetes with Azure Container Apps & Dapr - Todd Whitehead - NDC Melbourne 2022
media:group.media:description:
Kubernetes is an amazingly powerful and flexible platform that introduces a range of new complexities and required knowledge. Sometimes we need that all that control, but sometimes developers just need a scalable, reliable and low friction place to run our micro-services.
Azure Container Apps aims to meet this need by providing an opinionated Kubernetes environment configured with battle-tested opensource components and management practices.
This session will showcase a day in the life of a development team using Azure Container Apps and Dapr to see if the control trade-off lives up to its promise.


Check out more of our featured speakers and talks at
https://www.ndcconferences.com
https://ndcmelbourne.com/
